meanings.definition: To be born again in another body after death.
meanings.sent1: The idea of reincarnating means coming back to life in a different body.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in reincarnating after they pass away.
meanings.sent3: Imagine reincarnating as a butterfly and fluttering around the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit felt like it was reincarnating into a new existence.
meanings.sent5: The concept of reincarnating is like a never-ending cycle of life and rebirth.

meanings.definition: To undergo a new incarnation or embodiment.
meanings.sent1: After the ceremony, the old king was reincarnating as a wise owl.
meanings.sent2: The ancient deity was believed to be reincarnating in a young child.
meanings.sent3: The computer seemed to be reincarnating as a sleek, upgraded model.
meanings.sent4: The city was slowly reincarnating itself into a modern metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The artist felt like he was reincarnating his creativity with each new painting.
